title: Sailor Moon R: The Movie - The Promise of the Rose (Dub)
alternative_title: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon R: The Movie, 美少女戦士セーラームーンＲ THE MOVIE
description: When Mamoru was little he gave a rose to a little boy named Fiore. Fiore promised that one day he would bring Mamoru lots of flowers. Now Fiore has come back to earth but his intentions are not merely to fulfil a promise...
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Demons>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Magic>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Shoujo>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
